revised_title: A New Auxiliary Equation in the Theory of Fifth Order Equations
tldr: The author, Arthur Cayley, introduces a new auxiliary equation in the theory of equations of the fifth order. This equation simplifies the solution process and depends on a single equation of the sixth order. The author explains the connection between the new auxiliary equation and the resolvent-product equation, and demonstrates how the roots of the given quintic equation can be found using the new method.
